mapper.update: update sea_member_group set gname = #{gname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gtype = #{gtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, g_auth = #{gAuth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, g_upgrade = #{gUpgrade,jdbcType=INTEGER}, g_authvalue = #{gAuthvalue,jdbcType=INTEGER} where gid = #{gid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select gid, gname, gtype, g_auth, g_upgrade, g_authvalue from sea_member_group
